name: Slime Jumper
description: Slime Jumper is a cool Jump 'n Run somewhere between Super Mario and Super Meat Boy with nice, direct controls. You can buy different slimes with stars collected while playing the levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
